thread.title: Kohinoor — Rahul Raj, Muzik247
thread.title_full: Kohinoor — Rahul Raj, Muzik247 - The Times of India

author: Deepa Soman
title: Kohinoor — Rahul Raj, Muzik247
text:
Mollywood : Kohinoor has just two songs, a melody and an eighties-style fast number.
The tracks by Rahul Raj and Harinarayanan have enough potential to stay not only in the romantic hearts but also on the charts for a while. A chartbuster all the way, its first track Hemanthamen... is rich with its quality lyrics and mellifluous tune, with a quintessential romantic flavour to it. Its treatment and mood are quite similar to that of Malare of Premam, which can be attributed to the common connect, Vijay Yesudas.
Harinarayanan's lyrics are easy to remember and classy. Vineeth Sreenivasan sings the second song Dum Dum Dum , a fast number with enough space for some comic lines. It has a groove similar to that of some memorable yesteryear rhythmic tracks and can be a fun song to listen to.
